Author: akatsuki_no_bun
Text: Yo, that’s pretty normal. Shopping was very little fun for a solid year after I weight restored. And people don’t really know how to react to the whole thing. The transition from spending my time with supportive mental health professionals to spending it with my often invalidating but mostly well meaning friends was rocky. A lot of “when x happens I feel y” statements were made and we eventually got through it. The dysmorphia  of the rapid body change is really really rough 😔
